publisherFeedbackSystem.title: Publisher Feedback System (recommended)
publisherFeedbackSystem.description: This data publisher has their own feedback system. This is the recommended option for feedback that has to do with the published data.

datasetContact.title: Dataset contact
datasetContact.description: This dataset have a contact email for feedback. This is a good option if your feedback is related to the published data and not the interpretation.

gbifGithub.title: GBIF issue tracking
gbifGithub.description: GBIF process and interprets data. If you believe there is an issue with the data interpretation, you can provide feedback here. This option requires a Github account.
